code: export var baseUrl='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}else{return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}}export function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(checkResponse);}export function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(checkResponse).then(function(data){if(data.token){localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);return data;}});}export function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(checkResponse);}
